extendedInfo.description: Magnificent Live Wallpapers. The heavenly roar of the great and devine Gold Dragon opens the fate of the night with thunderbolt strikes.Data contents"Ryujin Legend Lightning""Ryujin Legend Ocean"This app is data app of "Dream Monday Family".After you download "Dream Monday Family", select app which you downloaded from "Data apps" of Settings of Dream Monday Family and download the wallpapers, please.The wallpapers is downloaded in "Dream Monday Family".https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dmf.wall.DMFLwpSubFull versionhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dmf.wall.RyujinLegend

reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars if it had sound effects
reviews.comment: This is perfect for my phone.. I mean the two of my favorite things are dragons and thunderstorms. Seeing as my favorite two things in one is the happiest moment but aside from an awesome live wallpaper is the lack of sound effects... bummer :/ but overall this by far THY best live wallpaper I ever downloaded!   P.s. with the next update it should be for adding the sound effects
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smart...
reviews.comment: Whats the point of downloading this cool LIVE wallpaper if its going to expire a day later leaving you with a simple non live wallpaper? Cause they want you to pay money of course smart play but your not making me pay for this! I rather download dragons in google than this crap!
reviews.author: A Google User
